DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

HC (Malon).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: I'll make you eat those words.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: 'Member when Ganon was a blue pig?^I 'member.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the stick is mightier than the sword.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

KF (Outside Storms).text: Here's a hint, @. Don't be bad.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

LW (Bridge).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

SFM (Saria).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

ToT (Left).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

ToT (Left-Center).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

ToT (Right).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

ZF (Fairy).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

ZR (Near Domain).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.
